name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EkLine: Automate content consistency and quality

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate content reviews and enforce style and branding guidelines effortlessly with the EkLine browser extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The EkLine browser extension is your go-to tool for creating and maintaining high-quality documentation. 🌟 Designed for product managers, engineers, and technical writers, this tool helps you automate user-facing content reviews directly in Google Docs and other browser-based editors.

Key Features:
	•	✍️ Automated Reviews: Ensure documentation adheres to style, branding, and tone guidelines effortlessly.
	•	✅ One-Click Fixes: Save time with the 'Accept All' feature to implement suggested changes instantly.
	•	📊 Quality Score Metrics: Measure and improve content readability, clarity, and consistency.
	•	🔗 Accurate Link and Terminology Checks: Keep links functional and terminology consistent.

Why EkLine?
Simplify your documentation workflows, 🚦 reduce manual reviews, and deliver polished, professional content every time. Perfect for teams who value quality and efficiency.

✨ Download the EkLine browser extension today and start automating your documentation reviews!
